content: I think freelancing or online tutoring could be a good fit for me, especially since I'm studying International Business and have some experience in marketing and writing. I'll definitely research the platforms and opportunities available, and update my skills and knowledge in those areas. However, I also want to make sure I don't overcommit myself and compromise my studies. I'll need to prioritize my tasks and time management to ensure I can balance everything. Do you have any tips on how to prioritize tasks and manage my time effectively?
